description: Allows the player to throw a potion.

duration.description: Specifies the duration of the effect in ticks (1 second = 20 ticks).

effect.description: Specifies the effect of the thrown potion.

cooldown.description: Specifies the cooldown of the ability.

name.description: Specifies the name of the ability.

amplifier.description: Specifies the amplifier of the effect.

speed.description: Specifies the speed of the projectile.
